name: Flowar
description:
*** How to play ***

Expend your territory and transmit your corruption to the entire world!

To win, you must conquer other factions' most valuable thing: their flower.

4 kinds of building are available :

- Pool: Increases your income

- House: Increases the number of workers you own

- Pillar: Makes the adjacent cells stronger and more likely to conquer opponents' territory

- Bridge: Allows you to cross the river

*** Controls ***

Arrow keys / Mouse on borders of the screens - Move the map view

Right click on a tile - Build selection

*** About ***

Flowar is a game that was made for the Global Game Jam 2018 by a team of 4 students in 48 hours. This year's theme was "transmissions", which our game relates with the conquest mechanic.

In the game, you are playing as the head of your corruption system. Build towers, pools and houses to develop and conquer the whole map!

Thanks for playing!
